title:
What is the issue with the Laney school bus route in NH county?  The Laney-Middlesound school bus over the last several months has either been late (sometimes up to an hour) or has been substituted with a Noble school bus.  



Why hasn\'t the school district notified parents (of both Noble & Laney students) of the ongoing problem?  I feel sure some parents of 6th graders would be surprised to learn their kids are riding 3 to a seat with high school students.
